だって今日は特別な日で\r\n: Because today is a special day
だから迷わず走ったんだ\r\n: That's why I ran without hesitation
鼓動は最高潮 パレードみたいにね\r\n: My heartbeat is at its peak, like a parade
Ding Dong Ding Dong運命の鐘が鳴る\r\n: Ding Dong Ding Dong, the bell of destiny rings
あなたのこと想う その瞬間がHappyだね\r\n: Thinking of you, that moment is pure happiness
もし泣いちゃうような夜が来ても\r\n: Even if a night comes where I might cry
雪が溶けても 光るWhite Wish!\r\n: Even when the snow melts, my White Wish shines bright!
